['Reduced  Crypt Swarm cast time from 0.5 to 0.4.', "Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Death Prophet: Whenever Death Prophet hits an enemy with her  Crypt Swarm,  Silence,  Spirit Siphon, or with an attack, an  Exorcism flies out of her and attacks the enemy for double the usual Exorcism ghost damage, then return to Death Prophet and heal her. These ghosts apply a 100% movement speed slow for 0.3 seconds upon hitting their targets."]
